cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

set(PROJECT_NAME b64c)

    buffer.c
    decode.c
    encode.c
)

set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)

target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} INTERFACE .)
